author: Thiago Bomfim
title: Chuva no RJ: Petrópolis tem alagamentos e sirenes são acionadas; vídeo
text:
Cotidiano Chuva no RJ: Petrópolis tem alagamentos e sirenes são acionadas; vídeo Thiago Bomfim Do UOL, em São Paulo 22/03/2024 17h53 Atualizada em 22/03/2024 17h53
A cidade de Petrópolis, no Rio de Janeiro, está em estado de alerta com as intensas chuvas que atingem a região.
O que aconteceu Petrópolis está em alerta. A Defesa Civil alterou o estágio de atenção do município para "Alerta", e o Governo do Rio de Janeiro anunciou que o "risco hidrológico e geológico muito alto na cidade de Petrópolis". A cidade deve continuar enfrentando enchentes, inundações, alagamentos e deslizamentos.
Sirenes de emergência soaram duas vezes. A Prefeitura de Petrópolis acionou as sirenes de emergência duas vezes no primeiro distrito, nas localidades de São Sebastião, Vila Felipe, Dr. Thouzet, Independência e 24 de Maio. Quatro deslizamentos já foram registrados na cidade até agora.
Juca Kfouri
O infernal dia a dia de Robinho na prisão
Cristina Fibe
Parças: Daniel Alves ajudou Robinho (a ser preso)
Wálter Maierovitch
Quem deveria chamar Cid era Gonet, e não Moraes
Mauro Cezar
Escolhas de Dorival lembram listas do Leão
View this post on Instagram A post shared by SEMPDEC - Secretaria Municipal de Proteção e Defesa Civil (@defesacivil_petropolis)
Cuidados que população deve tomar Defesa Civil orienta população. Em coletiva de imprensa, a Defesa Civil Nacional e o Ministério da Integração indicaram cuidados que a população das áreas afetadas deve tomar:
Obedeça sirenes, deixar sua casa caso seja pedido e seguir orientações de autoridades. Vale o mesmo para carros de som e mensagens de SMS. Obedeça ordens de autoproteção e pense na vida em primeiro lugar. Envie seu CEP para o número 40199 e receba alertas da Defesa Civil em seu celular. Entre em contato com a Defesa Civil local para se informar quais são os refúgios mais próximos e sobre riscos. Busque abrigo em áreas seguras e aguarde até que a chuva pare. Evite atravessar regiões alagadas. A exposição e o contato com a água contaminada podem causar doenças como hepatites virais, leptospirose, diarreias e verminoses. Se informe em fontes oficiais. Leia a cartilha de deslizamentos da Defesa Civil e a de enchentes do Ministério da Saúde . #Alerta de #chuvas intensas no Brasil entre os dias 21 a 23 de Março.
?? Não se esqueça: busque abrigo em áreas seguras e aguarde até que a chuva pare. Evite atravessar regiões alagadas, já que podem representar perigos em potencial. pic.twitter.com/kku1VFeK0f
-- Defesa Civil Nacional (@defesacivilbr) March 21, 2024 Comunicar erro Veja também Deixe seu comentário Só para assinantes

author: New Telegraph
title: Economic Sabotage: Troops Recover N13bn Stolen Products In Q3 – DHQ
text:
… 65 terrorist commanders, 1,937 others killed
..1,304 weapons, 43,347ammo seized
The ongoing kinetic operations against economic sabotage in the South South general area resulted in the recovery of stolen crude and other illegally-refined products worth N13,081,605,534.00 in the last three months, the Defence Headquarters (DHQ) said on Thursday.
This comes amid efforts by the Federal Government to raise the nation’s crude production capacity to 2, 000 barrels per day (bpd).
The Director of Defence Media Operations, Major General Edward Buba, who made the disclosure at the regular briefing on troops’ exploits across the theatres at the DHQ in Abuja, said during the period under review also (July – September), troops killed at least 65 terrorist commanders, 1,937 other enemies of the State.
While reiterating the fact that security has become a whole-of-society approach, the spokesperson said the activities of the violent extremists are simply the last kicks of a dying horse.
He said: “The armed forces prioritised the killing of terrorist leadership and destruction of terrorist network in its ongoing counter terrorism and counter insurgency operations across the country.
Accordingly, troops are effectively attacking the terrorist leaders, commanders, combatants, as well as their rank and file operatives.
“All through the stretch of the third quarter of the year, troops conducted synchronised bombardments by the air force and ground forces, that significantly diminished terror military capabilities and cohesion.
“Troops offensive actions culminated in the neutralization of over 65 notable terrorist leaders, commanders and combatants across all theatres of operations.
“Significant terrorist leaders were eliminated from the battlefield. These include: Munzir Arika, Sani Dilla (Dan Hausawan Jubillaram), Ameer Modu, Matawal Bitrus, Thomas Benedict, Mohammed Sani, Rimamy (aka Omo), Terkimbi Injoko, Jacob Uzege, Ibn Kasir, Kachalla Ɗan Baleri, Kachallah Halilu Jimmare (Buzu), Kachalla Dan Ali Garin Fadama, Kachalla Dan Mani Na Inna, Kachalla Basiru Zakarriya and ofem Emmanuel Igwe among others.
“Overall, in the third quarter of this year, troops neutralized 1,937 terrorists, arrested 2,782 suspected terrorists and other criminal elements as well as rescued 1,854 kidnapped hostages.
“Furthermore, troops recovered 1,304 weapons, 43,347 ammunition and denied the oil theft of an estimated sum over N13 Bn (N13,081,605,534.00) only.’
He gave the breakdown as follows: 688 AK47 rifles, 32,945 rounds of 7.62mm special ammo, 9,677 rounds of 7.62mm NATO, 191 assorted arms and 8,292 assorted ammo.
Others are 12,143,870 litres of stolen crude oil, 2,623,216 litres of illegally refined AGO, 6,970 litres of DPK and 31,450 litres of PMS amongst other item. Accordingly , the nations daily crude oil production output is at an all time high with the nations daily target in sight.
“On the whole, troops are keeping the pressure on the terrorist until they are totally defeated.
‘The military is focussed on dismantling the terror infrastructure of these terror groups as well as destroying their will to fight.
“Accordingly, we are attacking any threat we identify, and removing it. The war objective is to destroy these groups, decapitate them, and erode their ability to rage terror attacks against citizens”, Buba stated.

author: infocielo
title: Residente: el puertorriqueño agotó las entradas para sus dos shows en Argentina | Infocielo
text: Residente: el puertorriqueño agotó las entradas para sus dos shows en Argentina Residente sold out: A pocos días de su llegada al país, el artista puertorriqueño agotó los tickets para sus ansiados shows en el Movistar Arena Tras sus recientes nominaciones a los Latin Grammys 2024, en las categorías ÁLBUM DEL AÑO, CANCIÓN DEL AÑO, MEJOR VIDEO MUSICAL y del impacto de su último material que incluye grandes colaboraciones, [Residente ](https://infocielo.com/sociedad/a-solo-dias-anunciar-la-colaboracion-wos-y-residente-lanzaron-problema-cabron-n771159) llegará a la Argentina con su nueva gira. El tour “LAS LETRAS YA NO IMPORTAN” comenzó en Barcelona y Madrid con entradas completamente agotadas reuniendo a más de 30.000 personas, y seguirá por Latinoamérica y Estados Unidos. Te puede interesar Su regreso a la Argentina en este mes de septiembre, es sumamente esperado para deslumbrar con su incomparable presencia sobre el escenario. El público de René no para de crecer alrededor del globo y nuevas camadas de fans van sumándose a la propuesta de este compositor que expresa con crudeza y belleza la realidad, logrando contar historias necesarias y movilizadoras. Luego de anunciar con un emotivo video su vuelta a la Argentina, la expectativa desatada fue absoluta agotándose así las entradas para el 27 y 28 de septiembre en el Movistar Arena. LA GIRA Y SU PASO POR ARGENTINA El multipremiado artista René Pérez Joglar, más conocido como Residente, llegará este año a Barcelona, Madrid, Nueva York, Los Ángeles, Argentina, Uruguay, Chile, Perú, Colombia, Ecuador, México, Guatemala, El Salvador y Puerto Rico con su nueva gira de conciertos y las canciones de su último material. Rapero, compositor, productor, cineasta, visionario, activista y actor latino, René marcó a toda una generación de artistas, fiel a su esencia continúa sorprendiendo y generando proyectos potentes que dan la vuelta al mundo y generan una repercusión absoluta. Recientemente anunció su gira oficial llamada “Las Letras Ya No Importan” luego del lanzamiento de su segundo álbum que lleva el mismo nombre. El álbum “Las Letras Ya No Importan” cuenta con 23 temas, en los que se incluyen artistas como Penélope Cruz, Ricky Martin, Busta Rhymes, Vico C, Big Daddy Kane, Rauw Alejandro, Christian Nodal, Arcangel, Jessie Reyez, Silvia Pérez Cruz, Ibeyi, WOS, Nino Freestyle, Amal Murkus, SFDK y AI2 El Aldeano. “Las Letras Ya No Importan” obtuvo certificación oro en México por sus ventas. Además, el álbum debutó en el número dos de la lista de Spotify de “Top Albums Debut Global” con su lanzamiento. El álbum incluye algunos de sus lanzamientos recientes de videos musicales como “This Is Not America” (un video premiado), “René”, “Quiero Ser Baladista con Ricky Martin”, “Problema Cabrón” con WOS, “Ron En El Piso” y su más reciente, “313” con Penélope Cruz y Silvia Pérez Cruz. “313” fue un homenaje al tiempo en memoria de Valentina, una amiga cercana que falleció. Trabajó estrechamente con él y tocaba el violín. En un adelanto reciente, le deja un mensaje de voz y habla sobre el significado del número 313. Comienza el álbum con un tributo llamado “Valentina”. Todos los videos musicales lanzados para parte de este álbum fueron dirigidos por Residente. La portada del álbum presenta la mano de Residente, que apenas alcanza una mano de seis dedos, lo que implica un contraste entre el arte artesanal significativo versus la cultura actual impulsada por algoritmos y plantea la pregunta de si su producción sigue siendo importante para la audiencia. El primer álbum solista de Residente fue lanzado en 2017 y se llamó “Residente”, recibió reconocimiento en todo el mundo y obtuvo múltiples premios. LO MÁS LEÍDO

author: Get News
title: Hearts at Home Continues Its Dedication to Providing Premier In-Home Care in Oklahoma City | FinancialContent Business Page
text:
Hearts at Home reaffirms its commitment to providing premier in-home elderly care in Oklahoma City, emphasizing personalized, compassionate services for a fulfilling life. As a trusted provider, they offer comprehensive care, ensuring seniors' well-being and family peace of mind. Discover more about their dedication to enhancing lives at https://heartsathomeok.com. Oklahoma City, OK - Hearts at Home, a distinguished provider of in-home care services, today reaffirmed its commitment to the community of Oklahoma City by continuing to offer exceptional elderly care. Recognizing the importance of accessible in-home care for families, Hearts at Home emphasizes its dedication to ensuring the well-being of loved ones through personalized and compassionate care services.
"At Hearts at Home, we understand the value of family and the need for quality elderly care in Oklahoma City. Our mission is to provide comprehensive in-home care services that cater to the unique needs of each individual, ensuring they receive the care and support necessary for a fulfilling life," stated Marcia Crook, owner of Hearts at Home. "We are committed to enhancing the lives of our clients and their families by maintaining our status as a trusted provider of elderly care in Oklahoma City."
Hearts at Home's approach to in-home care is centered around a deep understanding of the needs of the elderly and their families. By offering a wide range of services, including personal care, medication management, mobility assistance, and companionship, Hearts at Home ensures that families have the support they need to care for their elderly loved ones at home. This commitment highlights the agency's role in facilitating accessible, high-quality elderly care in Oklahoma City.
As the demand for reliable in-home care continues to grow, Hearts at Home's dedication to meeting this need underscores its pledge to the community. By prioritizing its clients' health, happiness, and well-being, Hearts at Home stands as a pillar of support for families across Oklahoma City, offering peace of mind and a higher quality of life for the elderly.
For more information about Hearts at Home and their In-Home Care in Oklahoma City, OK , please visit their website at https://heartsathomeok.com
About Hearts at Home:
Hearts at Home is a leading provider of in-home care services in Oklahoma City, OK. Known for its commitment to quality, compassion, and excellence, Hearts at Home prides itself on its ability to offer personalized, compassionate care that prioritizes the well-being of its clients. As a trusted provider of elderly care in Oklahoma City, Hearts at Home is dedicated to enhancing the lives of seniors and their families, ensuring they receive the dignity, respect, and quality of care they deserve.
